channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: This is the only $1 VPN you should consider – and it just added free antivirus for Black Friday!
item.description: There are few things better value than ultimate security for a dollar, right?

item.title: This Stunning ‘Predator: Badlands’ Hot Toys Even Comes With Half an Elle Fanning Figure
item.description: Dek and Thia bring the fight to your toy shelf with this ferocious new collectible.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: I tested the Epson Pro Cinema LS9000 projector, and it has incredible performance and features for the price
item.description: The Epson LS9000 delivers great 4K picture quality and gaming performance for the price compared to its home theater projector competition.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: The best early Black Friday deals we’ve found so far on laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: Black Friday is the most anticipated day of the year for bargain hunters. While there’s still some time to go before November 28th, we’re already starting to see a healthy selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, Bose’s QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are on sale […]

item.title: Tesla releases detailed safety report after Waymo co-CEO called for more data
item.description: The new data, released Friday, finally addresses some of the biggest criticisms of the paltry "safety reports" Tesla's released for years.

item.title: Disney and the BBC’s Disintegrated ‘Doctor Who’ Deal Is Leaving Its Spinoff in Limbo
item.description: 'The War Between the Land and the Sea' will broadcast in the UK starting December 7... but in the US, it's still not coming until next year.

item.title: California Startup Flies Military Version of Its Air Taxi for the First Time
item.description: Joby Aviation developed a turbine electric, autonomous aircraft that can carry heavier payloads for longer distances.

item.title: The 19 Best Tried and Tested Gifts for Bird Lovers (2025)
item.description: Whether your giftee loves bird watching, bird feeding, or just putting a bird on it, these gifts are sure to be a hit.

item.title: Top PC hardware maker says no more Black Friday deals - PNY halts new promotions as fears of rising costs spread
item.description: PNY’s suspension of Black Friday storage deals highlights a growing NAND and DRAM shortage, fueled by AI-driven market demand.

item.title: A Surprise Flu Variant Threw Off the Vaccine. Get Ready for a Brutal Winter
item.description: Scientists are warning that this winter's flu vaccine will be less effective against an emerging variant of H3N2 flu named subclade K.

item.title: I tested the official Nintendo Switch 2 camera against its Piranha Plant rival – here’s the model I’d buy
item.description: Nintendo's official Switch 2 camera battles it out against Hori's Piranha Plant webcam, and there can only be one winner.

item.title: TikTok’s ‘flip camera trend’ is going viral—for all the wrong reasons
item.description: Critics say the prank humiliates uninvolved bystanders and exposes them to online mockery, sparking a larger conversation about cyberbullying. Another week, another questionable TikTok trend. The latest internet sensation has social media users asking someone to film them dancing. Instead, the dancer clicks the flip-camera button mid-dance — filming the filmer instead of themselves. And while the trend is meant to be funny (and, of course, get clicks), not everyone is laughing....
